title: Super Bowl Wagers Rise to Records as Online Sports Betting Sweeps U.S.
sub_head: FanDuel, DraftKings and BetMGM grapple over market share as access to legal sportsbooks booms
body:
Gambling on the Super Bowl this year reached record highs, after legalized sports betting surged across the U.S. in 2021.
It is still unclear exactly how much money was wagered on Sundayâ€™s game, in which the Los Angeles Rams beat the Cincinnati Bengals 23-20. But reports from gambling operators and state regulators indicate it was a huge day for the booming market.
